page.description: Downloads a file specified by a URL and saves it on the user's machine.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5_downloadfile(C source_file ,C target_file )

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = the download was successful .F. = the download was not successful

argument.name: source_file
argument.description: The URL of a page to download.

argument.name: target_file
argument.description: The filename of the text file that will receive the downloaded page.

page.discussion: The A5_DownLoadFile() function downloads a file specified by a URL and saves it on the user's computer.
